description:
Zenoti offers you central, smart marketing capabilities that are unparalleled in the market. 

What can’t you find anywhere else?

1.	Deeper segmentation with endless possibilities: Tailor marketing based on a guest’s behavior across your brand, not just transactions at a specific location. Examples:
    •	Anyone who’s visited the same provider more than 3 times. 
    •	Anyone who spent more than $1000, gave poor feedback in the last visit, and hasn’t revisited in more than a month
    •	Use data you collect every day in digital forms: Create segments based on tags you create for hair, skin, age or any other factors you collect in your digital forms. 
2.	Central campaign management: With one click, your campaign goes live across your entire organization. Other software makes you launch campaigns by individual locations.  
3.	Throttle messaging: We help you deploy the right number of messages to the right people at the right time. Rather than send 10,000 messages at once, Zenoti helps you send 1,000 per week. 
4.	Central reporting: View campaign performance by store or across your entire business. Open the report, click, and view how much money you made.
title: Power-packed marketing for micro-targeted segments

Now, color is always done before a cut, or a facial must take place before a massage.
title: Automatically book services in the right order

description: As an owner, keeping your customers loyal to your brand is a priority. You want to be sure your customers know that if one location is booked up, they can easily find another location with availability. Your software can auto-prompt them faster than a great front desk, 24/7.
title: Find a nearby location: Don’t lose a booking because you’re booked up

description: Your best receptionist also knows that different providers charge different prices for a service, or sometimes take different amounts of time to perform the service. Zenoti stores all this information so when someone books an appointment, they see the right pricing and length of time. This fills up your appointment book error-free.
title: Provider-specific appointment lengths & pricing

description:
Guests often come in for more than one service. Most software simply books these service appointments in standard blocks, one after the other. A great front desk will be smart about it, though, grouping services together and eliminating wasted time. Zenoti automatically does this for you, keeping your appointment book full and your staff fully optimized. 

For example: If a waxer can do eyebrows in 5 minutes, upper lip in 5 minutes and half legs in 30 minutes, your guest really needs just 45 minutes for an appointment. Zenoti knows this, and can compile these services for you. 

Other software might buffer each service, not understanding that the same guest with a single provider takes less time. So, with standard online booking, that appointment might be eyebrows for 15 minutes, upper lip for 15 minutes, and half legs for 30 minutes, assuming buffer time. That’s a longer duration, which is bound to leave your staff with extra time on their hands throughout the day.
title: Auto-compile and collapse services together to show actual service time

description:
As an owner, you want to schedule staff smart. Staff need not be there if their role in the service is over.  Zenoti knows this, too. That’s why our smart solution allows guests to book services that extend beyond some of the staff’s work days. You can set your team free if their part of the appointment has ended, but the guest is staying for other services.  

Example: You’ve decided that your colorists need not stay during the processing time. If a colorist’s day ends at 5, guests can still book a 4:30 appointment for color/cut/finishing. Once the color’s applied, the provider can breeze out the door, leaving time for the color to set and for the rest of the team to start working their magic.
title: Auto-scheduling process segments outside of stylist's schedule

description: The bigger the party, the more important it is to ensure the party planner commits to your brand. With Zenoti, guests can book up to 100 friends at a time - without the need of having to input specific guest details. So you can start planning, and they can save the date with that credit card.
title: Effortless large party bookings

description:
Got a group that prizes togetherness as much as the individualized attention they're used to? No problem! Zenoti allows each guest to book specific preferences and providers as desired. 

Whether it’s a family booking, where a parent prefers one provider and the kids like another, or that harried maid of honor who’s booking an entire bridal party ahead of the big day, Zenoti ensures that the group’s time together is as unique as each of the individuals in it.
title: Flexible - yet personalized - group bookings

description:
As an owner, you know that booking groups can be tricky. But not with Zenoti. We offer elegant solutions for groups of 2 to 100+. It can mean managing dozens of options. Our integrated and intelligent software is the only one out there that manages the providers, guest preferences, the rooms, the equipment and the payment. So:
•	Your front desk need not tie up the phone line figuring out logistics. 
•	Your guests can book anytime, day or night.
•	You can rest assured that Zenoti has handled all the details – accurately.
title: Smooth +1 (or 2 or 3 or more) bookings

description:
Keep couples focused on togetherness while your system confirms that everything’s in place. Booking a couple’s massage is a cinch. Zenoti checks to ensure the right number of beds are free, in the right rooms, and with the right number of therapists. 

So instead of waiting while your front desk manually checks all the details, you’re guest is simply checking out online.
title: No-fuss couples booking

description: Help your guest create a surprise experience for a friend or loved one. Your front desk creates the surprise booking, and all communications go to the gifter right up to the big day. Zenoti won’t message the recipient who’s receiving the service – where all other systems do just that, spoiling the surprise. This is great for special occasions such as birthdays, anniversaries, Valentine's Day or more.

description:

As an example, Zenoti can fill 45 minutes of color processing with something quick, like a boy’s haircut and a wax, ensuring your chair’s filled and your provider is busy.

description:
Zenoti offers you central, smart marketing capabilities that are unparalleled in the market. 

What can’t you find anywhere else?

1.	Deeper segmentation with endless possibilities: Tailor marketing based on a guest’s behavior across your brand, not just transactions at a specific location. Examples:
    •	Anyone who’s visited the same provider more than 3 times. 
    •	Anyone who spent more than $1000, gave poor feedback in the last visit, and hasn’t revisited in more than a month
    •	Use data you collect every day in digital forms: Create segments based on tags you create for hair, skin, age or any other factors you collect in your digital forms. 
2.	Central campaign management: With one click, your campaign goes live across your entire organization. Other software makes you launch campaigns by individual locations.  
3.	Throttle messaging: We help you deploy the right number of messages to the right people at the right time. Rather than send 10,000 messages at once, Zenoti helps you send 1,000 per week. 
4.	Central reporting: View campaign performance by store or across your entire business. Open the report, click, and view how much money you made.

description: Your best receptionist also knows that different providers charge different prices for a service, or sometimes take different amounts of time to perform the service. Zenoti stores all this information so when someone books an appointment, they see the right pricing and length of time. This fills up your appointment book error-free.
title: Provider-specific appointment lengths & pricing

description:
Guests often come in for more than one service. Most software simply books these service appointments in standard blocks, one after the other. A great front desk will be smart about it, though, grouping services together and eliminating wasted time. Zenoti automatically does this for you, keeping your appointment book full and your staff fully optimised. 

For example: If a waxer can do eyebrows in 5 minutes, upper lip in 5 minutes and half legs in 30 minutes, your guest really needs just 45 minutes for an appointment. Zenoti knows this, and can compile these services for you. 

Other software might buffer each service, not understanding that the same guest with a single provider takes less time. So, with standard online booking, that appointment might be eyebrows for 15 minutes, upper lip for 15 minutes, and half legs for 30 minutes, assuming buffer time. That’s a longer duration, which is bound to leave your staff with extra time on their hands throughout the day.
title: Auto-compile and collapse services together to show actual service time

description:
As an owner, you want to schedule staff smart. Staff need not be there if their role in the service is over.  Zenoti knows this, too. That’s why our smart solution allows guests to book services that extend beyond some of the staff’s work days. You can set your team free if their part of the appointment has ended, but the guest is staying for other services.  

Example: You’ve decided that your colorists need not stay during the processing time. If a colorist’s day ends at 5, guests can still book a 4:30 appointment for color/cut/finishing. Once the color’s applied, the provider can breeze out the door, leaving time for the color to set and for the rest of the team to start working their magic.
title: Auto-scheduling process segments outside of stylist's schedule

description: The bigger the party, the more important it is to ensure the party planner commits to your brand. description:
Zenoti offers you central, smart marketing capabilities that are unparalleled in the market. 

What can’t you find anywhere else?

1.	Deeper segmentation with endless possibilities: Tailor marketing based on a guest’s behavior across your brand, not just transactions at a specific location. Examples:
    •	Anyone who’s visited the same provider more than 3 times. 
    •	Anyone who spent more than $1000, gave poor feedback in the last visit, and hasn’t revisited in more than a month
    •	Use data you collect every day in digital forms: Create segments based on tags you create for hair, skin, age or any other factors you collect in your digital forms. 
2.	Central campaign management: With one click, your campaign goes live across your entire organization. Other software makes you launch campaigns by individual locations.  
3.	Throttle messaging: We help you deploy the right number of messages to the right people at the right time. Rather than send 10,000 messages at once, Zenoti helps you send 1,000 per week. 
4.	Central reporting: View campaign performance by store or across your entire business. Open the report, click, and view how much money you made.
title: Power-packed marketing for micro-targeted segments

description: As an owner, keeping your customers loyal to your brand is a priority. You want to be sure your customers know that if one location is booked up, they can easily find another location with availability. Your software can auto-prompt them faster than a great front desk, 24/7.

description: Your best receptionist also knows that different providers charge different prices for a service, or sometimes take different amounts of time to perform the service. Zenoti stores all this information so when someone books an appointment, they see the right pricing and length of time. This fills up your appointment book error-free.
title: Provider-specific appointment lengths & pricing

description:
Guests often come in for more than one service. Most software simply books these service appointments in standard blocks, one after the other. A great front desk will be smart about it, though, grouping services together and eliminating wasted time. Zenoti automatically does this for you, keeping your appointment book full and your staff fully optimised. 

For example: If a waxer can do eyebrows in 5 minutes, upper lip in 5 minutes and half legs in 30 minutes, your guest really needs just 45 minutes for an appointment. Zenoti knows this, and can compile these services for you. 

Other software might buffer each service, not understanding that the same guest with a single provider takes less time. So, with standard online booking, that appointment might be eyebrows for 15 minutes, upper lip for 15 minutes, and half legs for 30 minutes, assuming buffer time. That’s a longer duration, which is bound to leave your staff with extra time on their hands throughout the day.
title: Auto-compile and collapse services together to show actual service time

description:
As an owner, you want to schedule staff smart. Staff need not be there if their role in the service is over.  Zenoti knows this, too. That’s why our smart solution allows guests to book services that extend beyond some of the staff’s work days. You can set your team free if their part of the appointment has ended, but the guest is staying for other services.  

Example: You’ve decided that your colorists need not stay during the processing time. If a colorist’s day ends at 5, guests can still book a 4:30 appointment for color/cut/finishing. Once the color’s applied, the provider can breeze out the door, leaving time for the color to set and for the rest of the team to start working their magic.
title: Auto-scheduling process segments outside of stylist's schedule

description: The bigger the party, the more important it is to ensure the party planner commits to your brand. With Zenoti, guests can book up to 100 friends at a time - without the need of having to input specific guest details. So you can start planning, and they can save the date with that credit card.
title: Effortless large party bookings

description:
Got a group that prizes togetherness as much as the individualised attention they're used to? No problem! Zenoti allows each guest to book specific preferences and providers as desired. 

Whether it’s a family booking, where a parent prefers one provider and the kids like another, or that harried maid of honor who’s booking an entire bridal party ahead of the big day, Zenoti ensures that the group’s time together is as unique as each of the individuals in it.
title: Flexible - yet personalised - group bookings

description:
As an owner, you know that booking groups can be tricky. But not with Zenoti. We offer elegant solutions for groups of 2 to 100+. It can mean managing dozens of options. Our integrated and intelligent software is the only one out there that manages the providers, guest preferences, the rooms, the equipment and the payment. So:
•	Your front desk need not tie up the phone line figuring out logistics. 
•	Your guests can book anytime, day or night.
•	You can rest assured that Zenoti has handled all the details – accurately.
title: Smooth +1 (or 2 or 3 or more) bookings

So instead of waiting while your front desk manually checks all the details, you’re guest is simply checking out online.

This is great for special occasions such as birthdays, anniversaries, Valentine's Day or more.

As an example, Zenoti can fill 45 minutes of color processing with something quick, like a boy’s haircut and a wax, ensuring your chair’s filled and your provider is busy.

    •	Anyone who’s visited the same provider more than 3 times. 
    •	Anyone who spent more than $1000, gave poor feedback in the last visit, and hasn’t revisited in more than a month
    •	Use data you collect every day in digital forms: Create segments based on tags you create for hair, skin, age or any other factors you collect in your digital forms. 
2.	Central campaign management: With one click, your campaign goes live across your entire organization. Other software makes you launch campaigns by individual locations.  
3.	Throttle messaging: We help you deploy the right number of messages to the right people at the right time. Rather than send 10,000 messages at once, Zenoti helps you send 1,000 per week. 
4.	Central reporting: View campaign performance by store or across your entire business. Open the report, click, and view how much money you made.

description: Your best receptionist also knows that different providers charge different prices for a service, or sometimes take different amounts of time to perform the service. Zenoti stores all this information so when someone books an appointment, they see the right pricing and length of time. This fills up your appointment book error-free.
title: Provider-specific appointment lengths & pricing

description:
Guests often come in for more than one service. Most software simply books these service appointments in standard blocks, one after the other. A great front desk will be smart about it, though, grouping services together and eliminating wasted time. Zenoti automatically does this for you, keeping your appointment book full and your staff fully optimised. 

For example: If a waxer can do eyebrows in 5 minutes, upper lip in 5 minutes and half legs in 30 minutes, your guest really needs just 45 minutes for an appointment. Zenoti knows this, and can compile these services for you. 

Other software might buffer each service, not understanding that the same guest with a single provider takes less time. So, with standard online booking, that appointment might be eyebrows for 15 minutes, upper lip for 15 minutes, and half legs for 30 minutes, assuming buffer time. That’s a longer duration, which is bound to leave your staff with extra time on their hands throughout the day.
title: Auto-compile and collapse services together to show actual service time

description:
As an owner, you want to schedule staff smart. Staff need not be there if their role in the service is over.  Zenoti knows this, too. That’s why our smart solution allows guests to book services that extend beyond some of the staff’s work days. You can set your team free if their part of the appointment has ended, but the guest is staying for other services.  

Example: You’ve decided that your colorists need not stay during the processing time. If a colorist’s day ends at 5, guests can still book a 4:30 appointment for color/cut/finishing. Once the color’s applied, the provider can breeze out the door, leaving time for the color to set and for the rest of the team to start working their magic.
title: Auto-scheduling process segments outside of stylist's schedule

description: The bigger the party, the more important it is to ensure the party planner commits to your brand. Whether it’s a family booking, where a parent prefers one provider and the kids like another, or that harried maid of honor who’s booking an entire bridal party ahead of the big day, Zenoti ensures that the group’s time together is as unique as each of the individuals in it.

description: Your best receptionist also knows that different providers charge different prices for a service, or sometimes take different amounts of time to perform the service. Zenoti stores all this information so when someone books an appointment, they see the right pricing and length of time. This fills up your appointment book error-free.
title: Provider-specific appointment lengths & pricing

description:
Guests often come in for more than one service. Most software simply books these service appointments in standard blocks, one after the other. A great front desk will be smart about it, though, grouping services together and eliminating wasted time. Zenoti automatically does this for you, keeping your appointment book full and your staff fully optimised. 

For example: If a waxer can do eyebrows in 5 minutes, upper lip in 5 minutes and half legs in 30 minutes, your guest really needs just 45 minutes for an appointment. Zenoti knows this, and can compile these services for you. 

Other software might buffer each service, not understanding that the same guest with a single provider takes less time. So, with standard online booking, that appointment might be eyebrows for 15 minutes, upper lip for 15 minutes, and half legs for 30 minutes, assuming buffer time. That’s a longer duration, which is bound to leave your staff with extra time on their hands throughout the day.
title: Auto-compile and collapse services together to show actual service time

description:
As an owner, you want to schedule staff smart. Staff need not be there if their role in the service is over.  Zenoti knows this, too. That’s why our smart solution allows guests to book services that extend beyond some of the staff’s work days. You can set your team free if their part of the appointment has ended, but the guest is staying for other services.  

Example: You’ve decided that your colorists need not stay during the processing time. If a colorist’s day ends at 5, guests can still book a 4:30 appointment for color/cut/finishing. Once the color’s applied, the provider can breeze out the door, leaving time for the color to set and for the rest of the team to start working their magic.
title: Auto-scheduling process segments outside of stylist's schedule

description: The bigger the party, the more important it is to ensure the party planner commits to your brand. With Zenoti, guests can book up to 100 friends at a time - without the need of having to input specific guest details. So you can start planning, and they can save the date with that credit card.

Whether it’s a family booking, where a parent prefers one provider and the kids like another, or that harried maid of honor who’s booking an entire bridal party ahead of the big day, Zenoti ensures that the group’s time together is as unique as each of the individuals in it.

description:
Zenoti offers you central, smart marketing capabilities that are unparalleled in the market. 

What can’t you find anywhere else?

1.	Deeper segmentation with endless possibilities: Tailor marketing based on a guest’s behavior across your brand, not just transactions at a specific location. Examples:
    •	Anyone who’s visited the same provider more than 3 times. 
    •	Anyone who spent more than $1000, gave poor feedback in the last visit, and hasn’t revisited in more than a month
    •	Use data you collect every day in digital forms: Create segments based on tags you create for hair, skin, age or any other factors you collect in your digital forms. 
2.	Central campaign management: With one click, your campaign goes live across your entire organization. Other software makes you launch campaigns by individual locations.  
3.	Throttle messaging: We help you deploy the right number of messages to the right people at the right time. Rather than send 10,000 messages at once, Zenoti helps you send 1,000 per week. 
4.	Central reporting: View campaign performance by store or across your entire business. Open the report, click, and view how much money you made.
title: Power-packed marketing for micro-targeted segments

As an owner, you know that booking groups can be tricky. But not with Zenoti. We offer elegant solutions for groups of 2 to 100+. It can mean managing dozens of options. Our integrated and intelligent software is the only one out there that manages the providers, guest preferences, the rooms, the equipment and the payment. So:
•	Your front desk need not tie up the phone line figuring out logistics. 
•	Your guests can book anytime, day or night.
•	You can rest assured that Zenoti has handled all the details – accurately.
title: Smooth +1 (or 2 or 3 or more) bookings

description:
Keep couples focused on togetherness while your system confirms that everything’s in place. Booking a couple’s massage is a cinch. Zenoti checks to ensure the right number of beds are free, in the right rooms, and with the right number of therapists. 

So instead of waiting while your front desk manually checks all the details, you’re guest is simply checking out online.
title: No-fuss couples booking

description: Help your guest create a surprise experience for a friend or loved one. Your front desk creates the surprise booking, and all communications go to the gifter right up to the big day. Zenoti won’t message the recipient who’s receiving the service – where all other systems do just that, spoiling the surprise. This is great for special occasions such as birthdays, anniversaries, Valentine's Day or more.
title: Surprise visit bookings

description: You know every booking is an opportunity for add-ons, but not everyone on your team’s good at offering them. With Zenoti, our system automatically prompts your front desk or guests booking online to upsell the relevant add-ons during the booking process. We’re the only solution that makes this into one workflow to ensure you increase your revenue for each booking.
title: Effortless online upselling

description: 70% of the time, your customer rebooks the same services with the same provider. Zenoti makes this simple with a QuickBook solution that’s just 2 taps.
title: 2-tap rebooking

description: Unparalleled simplicity lets your guests book a service in less than 30 seconds.
title: 30-second first-time booking

description:
As an owner, there’s nothing worse than underutilised staff. If they’re not working, everyone’s losing out. Zenoti software knows this, which is why we turn downtime – like color processing time – into open slots that guests can book online for other services.  

As an example, Zenoti can fill 45 minutes of color processing with something quick, like a boy’s haircut and a wax, ensuring your chair’s filled and your provider is busy.
title: Increase utilisation by booking during processing times

description: Some services you offer must start on the hour, and starting even 15 minutes late messes up the entire day. Zenoti understands that. So if you say that a massage must start at the top of the hour, your guests and your front desk will see only that option available.
title: Auto-set intervals and start times

business_benefits: Streamline operations, elevate the guest experience
description: Selling your retail products online has never been simpler with Shopify Plus. With a single sign-on, your guests move from your webstore to your Shopify storefront seamlessly. So it’s just as convenient to book a service with their stored card as it is to purchase your brand’s great products.
title: Power up your webstore with Shopify Plus Single Sign-On

description:
As an owner, you need to make sure your website helps you convert as many browsers as possible. But how do you figure out what’s working – and where you’re losing out? 

Zenoti’s the only software solution that integrates with GTM and Facebook Pixel to help you market to your current guests – and to new prospects. 

Figure out who’s browsing, what they’re interested in, and even find people with profiles just like your current guests. 

With data in hand, you can grow your brand faster by targeting the right consumers.

description:
Zenoti offers you central, smart marketing capabilities that are unparalleled in the market. 

What can’t you find anywhere else?

1.	Deeper segmentation with endless possibilities: Tailor marketing based on a guest’s behavior across your brand, not just transactions at a specific location. Examples:
    •	Anyone who’s visited the same provider more than 3 times. 
    •	Anyone who spent more than $1000, gave poor feedback in the last visit, and hasn’t revisited in more than a month
    •	Use data you collect every day in digital forms: Create segments based on tags you create for hair, skin, age or any other factors you collect in your digital forms. 
2.	Central campaign management: With one click, your campaign goes live across your entire organization. Other software makes you launch campaigns by individual locations.  
3.	Throttle messaging: We help you deploy the right number of messages to the right people at the right time. Rather than send 10,000 messages at once, Zenoti helps you send 1,000 per week. 
4.	Central reporting: View campaign performance by store or across your entire business. Open the report, click, and view how much money you made.
title: Power-packed marketing for micro-targeted segments

Behind the scenes, Zenoti follows your business rules and automatically ensures guests and staff can book the services only in the right order, and for the right time duration.  Now, color is always done before a cut, or a facial must take place before a massage.
title: Automatically book services in the right order

description: As an owner, keeping your customers loyal to your brand is a priority. You want to be sure your customers know that if one location is booked up, they can easily find another location with availability. Your software can auto-prompt them faster than a great front desk, 24/7.
title: Find a nearby location: Don’t lose a booking because you’re booked up

description: Your best receptionist also knows that different providers charge different prices for a service, or sometimes take different amounts of time to perform the service. Zenoti stores all this information so when someone books an appointment, they see the right pricing and length of time. This fills up your appointment book error-free.
title: Provider-specific appointment lengths & pricing

description:
Guests often come in for more than one service. Most software simply books these service appointments in standard blocks, one after the other. A great front desk will be smart about it, though, grouping services together and eliminating wasted time. Zenoti automatically does this for you, keeping your appointment book full and your staff fully optimised. 

For example: If a waxer can do eyebrows in 5 minutes, upper lip in 5 minutes and half legs in 30 minutes, your guest really needs just 45 minutes for an appointment. Zenoti knows this, and can compile these services for you. 

Other software might buffer each service, not understanding that the same guest with a single provider takes less time. So, with standard online booking, that appointment might be eyebrows for 15 minutes, upper lip for 15 minutes, and half legs for 30 minutes, assuming buffer time. That’s a longer duration, which is bound to leave your staff with extra time on their hands throughout the day.
title: Auto-compile and collapse services together to show actual service time

description:
As an owner, you want to schedule staff smart. Staff need not be there if their role in the service is over.  Zenoti knows this, too. That’s why our smart solution allows guests to book services that extend beyond some of the staff’s work days. You can set your team free if their part of the appointment has ended, but the guest is staying for other services.  

Example: You’ve decided that your colorists need not stay during the processing time. If a colorist’s day ends at 5, guests can still book a 4:30 appointment for color/cut/finishing. Once the color’s applied, the provider can breeze out the door, leaving time for the color to set and for the rest of the team to start working their magic.
title: Auto-scheduling process segments outside of stylist's schedule

description: The bigger the party, the more important it is to ensure the party planner commits to your brand. With Zenoti, guests can book up to 100 friends at a time - without the need of having to input specific guest details. So you can start planning, and they can save the date with that credit card.
title: Effortless large party bookings

Whether it’s a family booking, where a parent prefers one provider and the kids like another, or that harried maid of honor who’s booking an entire bridal party ahead of the big day, Zenoti ensures that the group’s time together is as unique as each of the individuals in it.

description:
Zenoti offers you central, smart marketing capabilities that are unparalleled in the market. 

What can’t you find anywhere else?

1.	Deeper segmentation with endless possibilities: Tailor marketing based on a guest’s behavior across your brand, not just transactions at a specific location. Examples:
    •	Anyone who’s visited the same provider more than 3 times. 
    •	Anyone who spent more than $1000, gave poor feedback in the last visit, and hasn’t revisited in more than a month
    •	Use data you collect every day in digital forms: Create segments based on tags you create for hair, skin, age or any other factors you collect in your digital forms. 
2.	Central campaign management: With one click, your campaign goes live across your entire organization. Other software makes you launch campaigns by individual locations.  
3.	Throttle messaging: We help you deploy the right number of messages to the right people at the right time. Rather than send 10,000 messages at once, Zenoti helps you send 1,000 per week. 
4.	Central reporting: View campaign performance by store or across your entire business. Open the report, click, and view how much money you made.
title: Power-packed marketing for micro-targeted segments

description: Your best receptionist also knows that different providers charge different prices for a service, or sometimes take different amounts of time to perform the service. Zenoti stores all this information so when someone books an appointment, they see the right pricing and length of time. This fills up your appointment book error-free.
title: Provider-specific appointment lengths & pricing

description:
Guests often come in for more than one service. Most software simply books these service appointments in standard blocks, one after the other. A great front desk will be smart about it, though, grouping services together and eliminating wasted time. Zenoti automatically does this for you, keeping your appointment book full and your staff fully optimised. 

For example: If a waxer can do eyebrows in 5 minutes, upper lip in 5 minutes and half legs in 30 minutes, your guest really needs just 45 minutes for an appointment. Zenoti knows this, and can compile these services for you. 

Other software might buffer each service, not understanding that the same guest with a single provider takes less time. So, with standard online booking, that appointment might be eyebrows for 15 minutes, upper lip for 15 minutes, and half legs for 30 minutes, assuming buffer time. That’s a longer duration, which is bound to leave your staff with extra time on their hands throughout the day.
title: Auto-compile and collapse services together to show actual service time

description:
As an owner, you want to schedule staff smart. Staff need not be there if their role in the service is over.  Zenoti knows this, too. That’s why our smart solution allows guests to book services that extend beyond some of the staff’s work days. You can set your team free if their part of the appointment has ended, but the guest is staying for other services.  

Example: You’ve decided that your colorists need not stay during the processing time. If a colorist’s day ends at 5, guests can still book a 4:30 appointment for color/cut/finishing. Once the color’s applied, the provider can breeze out the door, leaving time for the color to set and for the rest of the team to start working their magic.
title: Auto-scheduling process segments outside of stylist's schedule

description: The bigger the party, the more important it is to ensure the party planner commits to your brand. With Zenoti, guests can book up to 100 friends at a time - without the need of having to input specific guest details. So you can start planning, and they can save the date with that credit card.

Whether it’s a family booking, where a parent prefers one provider and the kids like another, or that harried maid of honor who’s booking an entire bridal party ahead of the big day, Zenoti ensures that the group’s time together is as unique as each of the individuals in it.
